column3: Name: “Table 1 of 1 on page 103 of 124”
Table: 95
Capital Improvement Plan
DESCRIPTION
As outlined in the Mary Peake Regional Storm Water Study,
improvements to the storms sewer system serving the
Berkshire Terrace area are needed which include the
placement of larger pipes for increased capacity.
Install drainage pipes and curbs and gutters on the circle end
of Cavalier Road to improve drainage for residents and also
to improve the life of the asphalt pavement which is failing
sooner than expected due to poor drainage.
Install drainage pipes along an existing ditch line between
Edgewood Drive and Mercury Boulevard to improve
neighborhood drainage conditions.
Annual funding of the Flood Assistance Program.
Install a drainage system, curbs and gutters and sidewalks to
the 600 block of Greenbriar Ave. This project addresses
citizens' safety concerns of traffic and pedestrians sharing the
same space on this narrow street.
Install drainage pipes, curbs and gutters on Bright Street from
Milford Ave to Ridgeway Ave. Improvements would also be
extended to sections of Homestead Ave, Fairland Ave and
Ridgeway Ave.
Install drainage pipes and curb and gutter on Monterrey Ave
and sections of Milford Ave, Homestead Ave, Fairland Ave
and Ridgeway Ave near Shell Road.
The last section of this neighborhood improvement project
would reconstruct the asphalt pavement of Judy Court, Fran
Circle, Susan Court and sections of Homestead Avenue,
Newport News Avenue and Milford Avenue.
Installation of curbs and gutters in residential neighborhoods.
This is a Council requested project.
Construct noise wall along I-64 from King Street to River
Street.
